channel.title: [REQ] I need help putting CFG files into winterlove's source
channel.description:
I need to know how to put cfg files into my servers.
I need Shops.cfg And uhh, whatever the file is called what you guys use to add npc's into your server.
And please dont tel me to use an other source becouse i already added full ALL stats except for farmining,slayer,ranged and magic. Please help. or if possible give me a link to a site where tuts aboput this are published?
~Joery

item.title: [REQ] I need help putting CFG files into winterlove's source
item.dc:creator: @Whitey_b Whitey b
item.description:
@Whitey_b wrote:

You’d need to code a shophandler first, or take one from another source, then you need to go about adding the bit that makes it load shops from the CFG when you trade/click an npc. Maybe take some code from another source?

Read full topic
item.source: [REQ] I need help putting CFG files into winterlove's source
